projects.title: Trie
projects.description: an online travel agency that enables any tourist to book any service from the website such (restaurants, hotels, and cinemas).

projects.title: Keeper
projects.description: just like google keep, keeper is a place where you can save all your quick notes and put all your ideas out of your head.

projects.title: Garment IO
projects.description: Search for any business you want just by his name as well as location the search result will be location, reviews, rating, and full address

projects.title: Corona

projects.title: Text Editor
projects.description: a simple text editor with a nice web interface that has the basic functionalities like save, update and view all files.

projects.title: Ask
projects.description: Q&A website to exchange knowledge through asking questions and for each question, there are set of options like (add like, and dislike, add a comment)
